devdoc.author: 1inch Network
devdoc.details: This contract allows users to claim tokens based on a Merkle tree where each leaf contains the cumulative amount a user can claim. This design allows for multiple distributions without requiring users to claim from each one separately.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

claim(address,uint256,bytes32,bytes32[]).details: The cumulative amount represents the total tokens the account can claim across all distributions

params.account: The address of the account to claim for
params.cumulativeAmount: The total cumulative amount the account is entitled to
params.expectedMerkleRoot: The Merkle root the proof was generated for
params.merkleProof: The Merkle proof verifying the claim

params.token_: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMerkleRoot(bytes32).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.merkleRoot_: The new Merkle root to set

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: CumulativeMerkleDrop

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are successfully claimed

MerkelRootUpdated(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Emitted when the Merkle root is updated

claim(address,uint256,bytes32,bytes32[]).notice: Claims tokens for a given account using a Merkle proof

cumulativeClaimed(address).notice: Mapping of addresses to their cumulative claimed amounts

merkleRoot().notice: The current Merkle root for the distribution

setMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Updates the Merkle root for the distribution

userdoc.notice: A contract for distributing tokens via Merkle tree proofs with cumulative claim amounts
